definition.name: Setup AWS SAM CLI
definition.description: Setup AWS SAM CLI and add it to the PATH
definition.author: aws-actions

inputs.name: version
inputs.description: The AWS SAM CLI version to install

inputs.name: python
inputs.description: The Python interpreter to use for AWS SAM CLI

inputs.name: use-installer
inputs.description: Set to true to install using native installers instead of pip

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: Authentication token to be used to call GITHUB Apis
